Summary: Electronic Engineer from the National University of Córdoba, Argentina. I am concluding a master's degree at the National Institute for Space Research (INPE, Brazil), where I work in the processing of satellite data and the design of a computer vision software to the research optical phenomena in the upper atmosphere, using Python. My professional goal is to gain experience in software and hardware design, and in the future, learn about Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

Experience.Organization: National Institute for Space Research ‑ INPE
Experience.Job Title: CNPq Scholarship Student - Space Science MSc
Tasks: I am currently a partner of the LEONA project, performing tasks for the maintenance and development of equipment, both hardware and software. The LEONA network consists of observation stations for Transient Luminous Events, short-lived phenomena that occur in the atmosphere above intense electrical storms. The stations are equipped with specialized cameras with high sensitivity to light and control devices that allow remote management of the system.
I developed a PC-Arduino user interface to handle the operation of motion devices.
Undergrad thesis: Design and implementation of a remotely-controlled camera system.
Technologies used: Hardware design, Arduino, C.
I put the experience gained doing technical support for professional installers of CCTV and intrusion alarms in an independent company.
Technical support to external and internal clients. IT support.
Preparation of manuals. Development and delivery of training courses.

Tasks: The 2019 LEONA project research campaign was performed remotely, using equipment installed in 7 cities in Argentina and Brazil.
Due to the 2020 pandemic, the 2020 campaign of the LEONA project focused on the data processing of the 2018 and 2019 campaigns, and also, the preparation of equipment for future LEONA stations.

I participated in a period of the RELAMPAGO-CACTI project, as a part of the LEONA project team, whose objective is the study of phenomena that occur in intense storms. During this campaign I installed equipment and instrumentation in 3 locations of Argentina.
